name: Turnip the Heat
description: Turnip the Heat is an arcade style arcade platformer with one simple task, stay out of the fire as long as possible. Platforms will drop down and you must nimbly assent as quickly as possible or become toasty. The longer you survive, the faster the platforms will drop. Also watch out for flying soot balls. They will stun you briefly if they strike you. This game was wholly created in under 10 hours during 2018 fall GameJam at Laguna Collage and was awarded first place.
